Posts.Content: TanyaJL wrote: hi...i'm new to this board--found it while i was trying to research. just the other night, i noticed i felt a lump on the under side of my right breast. so i pulled my breast up to look and in the area where i felt the lump, it's discolored (like a reddish color). i don't know if this could just be a bug bite or irritation or whatever. in the last couple days, it doesn't feel as big but i can still feel something. i can't tell if it moves or not though. it doesn't hurt either. i know...i probably should just call the doctor but wanted to see what others thought. thank you in advance. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: not sure if i should be concerned TanyaJL bonitamagic
